com.github.dylon.liblevenshtein.levenshtein.factory

Interface IStateTransitionFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StateTransitionFactory

    public interface IStateTransitionFactory
    Builds functions that transition states to other states, given some evidence.
    Since:
    2.1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IStateTransitionFunction build(int maxDistance)
      Builds a new state-transition function that only considers spelling candidates no more than maxDistance errors from the query term.
      void recycle(IStateTransitionFunction transition)
      Recycles a state-transition function so it may be re-used in build.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        IStateTransitionFunction build(int maxDistance)
        Builds a new state-transition function that only considers spelling candidates no more than maxDistance errors from the query term.
        Parameters:
        maxDistance - Maximum number of errors tolerated in transforming the query term into the spelling candidate.
        Returns:
        New state-transition function that only considers spelling candidates within maxDistance errors from the query term.

      • recycle

        void recycle(IStateTransitionFunction transition)
        Recycles a state-transition function so it may be re-used in build.
        Parameters:
        transition - IStateTransitionFunction to recycle. You must discard your reference to transition once you've recycled it.
